document.full_text: the kentucky derby winner animal kingdom took to the belmont track like a veteran monday morning, turning in an effortless half-mile workout with his regular rider, john velazquez, aboard.
document.title: the rail: animal kingdom turns in effortless workout
lines_and_colors: the kentucky derby winner animal kingdom took to the belmont track like a veteran monday morning, turning in an effortless half-mile workout with his regular rider, john velazquez, aboard.
